item.title: LabelBinarizer vs get_dummies
item.description: LabelBinarizer and get_dummies are two features of Scikit-Learn/Pandas that are extremely crucial when it comes to transforming data for the purpose of train-test split (creating models and testing them). Like everything, they both come with their own set of pros and cons in terms of when it is appropriate …
item.dc:creator: Vishal Sharma

item.title: Pandas - Creating DataFrames
item.description:
Data Science.

Using the Python programming language and it's many libraries, Data Scientists can complete a veriety of different tasks. One of the main tasks of a Data Scientist is to work with 'data' and figure out how to use it to their …
